title: Scientists discover a new hormone that can build strong bones
dot:
digraph Hormone_Bone_Healing{rankdir=TB;node[shape=rectangle, style=rounded, fontname="Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif", fontsize=12, margin=0.2];Hormone_Maternal_Brain_Hormone[label="Maternal Brain Hormone (CCN3)

- Hormone only produced during breastfeeding
- Maintains bone health"];Research_Results[label="Research Findings
- Addressed the mystery of women's bone health
